## Agent: NU (Research Module)
**Duration:** 1 hour  
**Branch:** `research`  
**Dependencies:** None (parallel)

### Task
Write integration docs

### Deliverables
- `research/docs/API.md` - Endpoints
- `research/docs/INTEGRATION.md` - Flows
- `research/README.md` - Quick start

### Content
**API.md:** Endpoints, curl examples, errors  
**INTEGRATION.md:** Writer→Research, Backend↔Research  
**README.md:** Install, run, test

### Success Criteria
✅ All 3 files created  
✅ Examples work  
✅ Clear explanation  
✅ Proper markdown

**Update this issue when complete.**
